title: What should I do in Input?
content:
Provide input folder for your Taxon Comparison task. Two types of input are accepted:

1. Two CleanTax files, one for each taxonomy to be aligned/compared.

2. Two ETC matrix generation output folders: one for each taxonomy to be aligned/compared.

If you have CleanTax files on your local computer, upload CleanTax files.

If you have folders output by Matrix Generation on ETC site, select existing folders..

The second option assumes that you've run Matrix Generation (probably also Text Capture) on two sets of taxonomic descriptions and obtained results.

title: Upload CleanTax Files
content:
If you have CleanTax files for the two taxonomies to be compared on your local computer, use Upload CleanTax Files option.

First Create a New Folder or Select an Existing Folder.

Then click on Upload Taxonomy Files button.

title: Select an Existing Folder
content:
You need to have two folders output by Matrix Generation on ETC site, one for each of the taxonomies to be compared. These folders have _output_by_MG_ in the folder names.

The second option assumes that you've run Matrix Generation (probably also Text Capture) on two sets of taxonomic descriptions and obtained results.

Select Select Existing Folder option, then

Click on Select Taxonomy 1/2 Folder button to select the two folders.
